alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Columbia and southern Rensselaer Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nassau, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... East Greenbush, Nassau, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Castleton-On-Hudson, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Sand Lake, East Nassau, Brookview, Van Hoesen Station, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Riders Mills, Taborton, Center Berlin, South Schodack and Denault Corners. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer
